titles.title: Warfighter Brain Health Act of 2022
Warfighter Brain Health Act of 2022
To direct the Secretary of Defense to establish a comprehensive initiative for brain health, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Warfighter Brain Health Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to establish the Warfighter Brain Health Initiative to unify efforts and programs across DOD to improve the cognitive performance and brain health of members of the Armed Forces.
The bill authorizes the Defense Health Agency to conduct a pilot program to monitor blast overpressure exposure as part of the initiative.
